title: In Tense Closed-Door Meeting on Gaza, Josh Gottheimer Comment on Muslims Sparks Fury
description:
In a Democratic caucus meeting on Israel–Gaza violence, Gottheimer made a disparaging remark about Muslim clergy, sources said.

The post In Tense Closed-Door Meeting on Gaza, Josh Gottheimer Comment on Muslims Sparks Fury appeared first on The Intercept.

title: “Beheaded Babies” Report Spread Wide and Fast — but Israel Military Won’t Confirm It
description:
“It’s been about four days since this incredible and tragic escalation of violence and the level of misinformation — even disinformation — seems near unprecedented.”

The post “Beheaded Babies” Report Spread Wide and Fast — but Israel Military Won’t Confirm It appeared first on The Intercept.

title: TikTok, Instagram Target Outlet Covering Israel–Palestine Amid Siege on Gaza
description:
Periods of Israeli-Palestinian violence have regularly resulted in the corporate suppression of Palestinian social media users.

The post TikTok, Instagram Target Outlet Covering Israel–Palestine Amid Siege on Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Tlaib and Bush Called to End Violence in Israel and Gaza. Then Fellow Democrats Attacked.
description:
Reps. Rashida Tlaib and Cori Bush called for a ceasefire and were attacked by AIPAC-aligned centrists. Democratic leadership stayed silent.

The post Tlaib and Bush Called to End Violence in Israel and Gaza. Then Fellow Democrats Attacked. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Justice Department Won’t Charge Border Patrol Agents Who Killed Native Man
description:
No explanation was given to Raymond Mattia’s family, who said prosecutors violated new federal guidelines on victims rights.

The post Justice Department Won’t Charge Border Patrol Agents Who Killed Native Man appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Gaza Cauldron
description:
Marwan Bishara breaks down Hamas’s deadly raids into Israel, the decades of Palestinian suffering, and how Benjamin Netanyahu may exploit the horrors.

The post The Gaza Cauldron appeared first on The Intercept.
